Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: Andy C.
Reviews.Content: Earsphone is very good sound. Battery is suitable for using. I can use for talking a long time. I can use to connect the internet above 6 hrs. For listening the music, I can listen for a long time more than 10 hrs. This phone is very good and it 's very easy to buy by the web.

ProductInfo.Features:
Internal GPS antenna.  USB and Wi-Fi tethering.  Bluetooth 3.0 with A2DP for wireless stereo headsets.  Wi-Fi.  4.3-inch LCD touch screen display (109 mm (4.3") with qHD (540 X 960) resolution).
Network: Quad-band GSM/GPRS/EDGE:850/900/1800/1900 MHz. HSPA/WCDMA: Europe/Asia/US T-Mobile: 900/AWS/2100 MHz. CPU Processing Speed: 1.5 GHz, dual core. Platform: Android with HTC Sense. Available storage:up to 1 GB, RAM: 768 MB.
8 megapixel color camera with Auto focus and dual LED flash. Front camera: VGA fixed focus color camera. HD video recording: 1080p. DLNA for wirelessly streaming media from the phone to your TV or computer.
Connectors: 3.5 mm stereo audio jack, micro-USB 2.0 (5-pin) port with mobile high-definition video link (MHL) for USB or HDMI connection. (Special cable required for HDMI connection.)
Rechargeable Lithium-ion battery 1730 mAh. Talk time: WCDMA: Up to 445 minutes, GSM: Up to 550 minutes. Standby time: WCDMA: Up to 540 hours, GSM: Up to 310 hours.
ProductInfo.Name: HTC SENXEBKEU Sensation XE with Beats Audio Unlocked Android Smartphone with 3G 1700/2100mHz (T-Mobile US ), Touchscreen, 8 MP Camera-Unlocked Phone-No Warranty-Black
